title: Classical and Romantic Piano
description: A collection of 22 solo piano pieces form the Baroque to Romantic eras of classical music with new recordings of pieces by Bach, Mozart, Brahms, Liszt, and many others.
longDescription:
Listen to samples of the tracks here!

A collection of 22 solo piano pieces form the Baroque to Romantic eras of classical music with new recordings of pieces by Bach, Mozart, Brahms, Liszt, and many others.


1. Bach Well Tempered Clavier Prelude in C Major 2:27

2. Bach Well Tempered Clavier Prelude in C Minor 1:40

3. Brahms Fantasia Opus 119 4:45

4. Brahms Hungarian Dance no 6 5:13

5. Chopin Mazurka no 1 opus 7 2:04

6. Chopin Mazurka no 2 opus 7 2:28

7. Chopin Scherzo no 2 8:32

8. Liszt Liebestraum No 3 4:50

9. Mozart Sonata No 17 Bb Major 1st mvmnt 8:29

10. Mozart Sonata No 17 Bb Major mvmnt 2 5:07

11. Rachmaninoff Prelude Opus 23 no 3 3:55

12. Rimsky Korsakov Flight of the Bumble Bee 1:48

13. Satie Le Fils des Etoiles trois preludes No 2 3:51

14. Schubert Impromptu in C Minor 8:29

15. Schumann A Tale of Distant Lands 1:07

16. Schumann Almost Too Serious 1:09

17. Schumann By The Fireside 1:18

18. Schumann Hobgoblin 1:18

19. Schumann In Slumberland 1:19

20. Schumann Reverie 1:45

21. Schumann The Poet Speaks 1:40

22. Sibelius Valse Triste 5:08
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  22 solo piano tracks
  •  high quality sound
  •  fast and responsive support

Number of Audio Wavs: 22

Number of Audio Cues: 22

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 75

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
